overview: What would you do if your night dreams really came true? What if what you dream about isn't what you really want? Your life could become hell. Marco decides to escape from those nightmares that are tearing up his daily life when Giulia, his best friend, introduces him to someone who could save him. But he finds himself trapped in the center of an intrigue from which he can't get rid of except... returning to reality.
title: On the Border of Dreams
